description:
This package is deprecated in favor of ncrunch-vs2013. The new package conforms to the guidelines for package IDs.  

    NCrunch is an automated concurrent testing tool for Visual Studio .NET 2013.  It intelligently runs automated tests so that you don't have to, and gives you a huge amount of useful information about your tested code, such as code coverage and performance metrics, inline in your IDE while you type.
summary: NCrunch is an automated concurrent testing tool for Visual Studio .NET 2013.  It intelligently runs automated tests so that you don't have to, and gives you a huge amount of useful information about your tested code, such as code coverage and performance metrics, inline in your IDE while you type.
author: Remco Software Ltd
